name: Employee Checkin Set Type IN OUT
script:
# Extract only the date part from the datetime field
checkin_date = frappe.utils.getdate(doc.time)  # Returns a date object

# Convert date to string to form a proper datetime range filter
start_datetime = str(checkin_date) + " 00:00:00"
end_datetime = str(checkin_date) + " 23:59:59"

# Fetch all check-ins for the employee on the same date
existing_checkins = frappe.get_all(
    "Employee Checkin",
    filters={
        "employee": doc.employee,
        "time": ["between", [start_datetime, end_datetime]]  # Corrected filter format
    },
    order_by="time asc"
)

# Determine log type based on the count of existing check-ins
doc.log_type = "IN" if len(existing_checkins) % 2 == 0 else "OUT"
